title: How to Clean Sleeping Beauty Turquoise Gold Jewelry

methods.name: Clean the Golden Areas of the Jewelry

steps.headline: Use a gold polishing cloth to remove the excess dirt gently from the golden parts of the jewelry.
steps.description: Do not touch the gemstone with the cloth.

steps.headline: Prepare a mixture of liquid dish detergent and lukewarm, not hot, water (a simple one to one ratio is fine).
steps.description: The combination will allow the accumulated dirt to get loose.

steps.headline: Use a cotton swab dipped in the water mixture to clean tarnished areas of the gold.
steps.description: Pay special attention to nooks and crannies of the jewelry piece, as most of the dirt will be accumulated in the corner areas.

steps.headline: Wipe the area with a damp cloth.
Use a jewelry cleaning brush (with soft bristles) and tap water to clean the Sleeping Beauty turquoise.
Dry the jewelry with a soft cloth.
Let the jewelry dry in air and direct sunlight before storing it.

text: Clean the Golden Areas of the Jewelry Use a gold polishing cloth to remove the excess dirt gently from the golden parts of the jewelry. Do not touch the gemstone with the cloth. Prepare a mixture of liquid dish detergent and lukewarm, not hot, water (a simple one to one ratio is fine). The combination will allow the accumulated dirt to get loose. Use a cotton swab dipped in the water mixture to clean tarnished areas of the gold. Pay special attention to nooks and crannies of the jewelry piece, as most of the dirt will be accumulated in the corner areas. Wipe the area with a damp cloth.  Clean the Sleeping Beauty Turquoise Use a jewelry cleaning brush (with soft bristles) and tap water to clean the Sleeping Beauty turquoise. Do not use any soap. Dry the jewelry with a soft cloth.  Let the jewelry dry in air and direct sunlight before storing it.
